summary: The document is a form detailing the employment history of Manuel Marti, a private in the US Army, at Polly Perry Stores, including his position as a Shipping Clerk, salary, and the reason for his termination. It also contains personal details such as his date of birth, social security number, and previous addresses. Marked as 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS', the document was last reviewed on 03/07/95 and is part of the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations records series. It was classified as UNCLASSIFIED.
key_findings: Manuel Marti was employed as a Shipping Clerk at Polly Perry Stores from 9 September 1960 to 12 February 1965.
His employment was terminated as he left of his own accord and was eligible for rehire.
The document is part of the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations records series.
The document was classified as UNCLASSIFIED but was released with deletions.
